amendment.description: An amendment numbered 26 printed in House Report 115-785 to strip the limiting language of `CVN-80' from the text which would allow funding for both CVN-80 and CVN-81 and thereby enable dual-buy.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wittman amendment (A035) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A035) offered by Mr. Wittman.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Wittman amendment (A035) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
